title: Bug 110566 - Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression 'row[0]' is set
description: When an invalid filter expression 'row[0] equals 0' is set on the data set, the result set is returned incorrectly or it returns null result set.
OB: When setting the filter expression 'row[0] equals 0' and executing the query, the data set is returned incorrectly or it returns a null result set.
EB: An error message indicating an invalid filter expression should be displayed.
SR:
1. Open the data set filter configuration.
2. Set the filter expression to 'row[0] equals 0'.
3. Execute the query.
4. Observe the data set result.
